channel.title: How would I set spoghtlights on my server? permantley
channel.description: I wanted spotlights on my server where I first start off x coords: 3194 y coords: 3431 I outlined some spots on pic to show where I want spotlights but I don't know how to add them would really appreiate some help please. thanks :D BTW I know you people are probably going to say I am leeching off of ricscape v2 but thats why I am wroking on it and trying to change it.
